dct_description_sm: Organisado na Administração do ex. mo s.nr governador do estado Dr. José Joaquim Seabra ; sendo secretario do estado o ex. mo sn. r eng.ro civil Arlindo Coelho Fragoso ; Desenho de M.el Carlos Weyll, Arch.to.
2 diagrams and 4 inset maps with 7 legends

4 legends for main map include production (such as coffee beans, cacao, cassiva, tabacco, etc.), "industria extractiva" (gold, wood, carnauba, diamonds, etc.), "Legenda do mappa agrologico," and basic legend of signs (cities, agricultural schools, roads, railroads (including projected), various waterways, anchorages, weather stations).
